code:
import{useEffect}from'react';const useCustomCursor=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const cursor=document.createElement('div');cursor.className='cursor-dot';document.body.appendChild(cursor);const moveCursor=e=>{cursor.style.left=e.clientX+'px';cursor.style.top=e.clientY+'px';};const handleMouseEnter=()=>{cursor.style.transform='scale(3)';cursor.style.backgroundColor='#D4AF37';};const handleMouseLeave=()=>{cursor.style.transform='scale(1)';cursor.style.backgroundColor='#D4AF37';};document.addEventListener('mousemove',moveCursor);// Add hover effects to interactive elements
const interactiveElements=document.querySelectorAll('button, a, [role="button"]');interactiveElements.forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mouseenter',handleMouseEnter);el.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleMouseLeave);});return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousemove',moveCursor);interactiveElements.forEach(el=>{el.removeEventListener('mouseenter',handleMouseEnter);el.removeEventListener('mouseleave',handleMouseLeave);});if(cursor.parentNode){cursor.parentNode.removeChild(cursor);}};},[]);};export default useCustomCursor;
